evidence.claim: Sequoia Reinsurance Services utilizes AWS for deployment and cloud services.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance in its health tech operations.
Integration with EHRs is facilitated through HL7 and FHIR standards.
Sequoia leverages Azure for inter-system data exchange and APIs.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling HIPAA X12 transactions or being a clearinghouse.
